recipeIngredientRows.purchaseProductName: BAK BUN FLUFFY POTATO NON VEGAN
PEPPER, RED WHOLE FIRE ROASTED IN WATER ITALIAN IMPORTED CAN SHELF STABLE
CHEESE, PEPPER JACK SLICED .75 OZ TWIN PACK REF

recipeMethods.stepInstructions:
1. Fill squeeze bottles with chipotle mayo. Hold below 40F.

3. Mix roasted anaheim peppers, roasted red peppers, and caramelized onions. Hold above 135F for service.

1. Using squeeze bottle, place 1 tbsp chipotle mayo on bottom bun.

2. Place the burger patty w/ melted cheese on top. 

3. Using 2 oz spoodle scoop, add 1 scoop (1.5 oz) onion & pepper mix 
on top of the cheese.

4. Close the sandwich with the other half of the bun.

1. Season each burger patty with 1/4 tsp salt pepper mix.

2. Run patties through Nieco broiler for 3 minutes 20 seconds.

3. Place the burger in bain marie and top with 1 cheese slice. Allow 
to melt for 20 seconds.
